data.actual_result: The channel name ellipses too close to the dropdown arrow, causing the ellipses to disappear behind the arrow
data.expected_result: The channel name ellipses before reaching the dropdown arrow, so the ellipses is fully visible
data.short_description: Selecting a channel with a long name for a webhook causes the ellipses to disappear behind the dropdown arrow
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you can manage webhooks - Create a new webhook - Select a channel with a long name (I used one that created a second line in the channel selector modal) - Observe where the ellipses meets the dropdown arrow - Click on the arrow to open the channel selector modal and observe the ellipses, to verify that there are three dots there - Click the arrow again to close the dropdown menu, and observe the number of dots
